MacIntuneManifest.Name: CIS Level 2 - Time Machine Auto Backup
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Enables automatic Time Machine backups to ensure data resilience and recovery capabilities. This CIS Level 2 security baseline control sets AutoBackup to true, providing regular automated backups for business continuity and disaster recovery. Essential for protecting against data loss from hardware failures, ransomware, or accidental deletion.
